verses.name: Genesis 27:4
verses.text: And make me savoury meat, such as I love, and bring it to me, that I may eat; that my soul may bless thee before I die.

verses.name: Genesis 27:5
verses.text: And Rebekah heard when Isaac spake to Esau his son. And Esau went to the field to hunt for venison, and to bring it.

verses.name: Genesis 27:6
verses.text: And Rebekah spake unto Jacob her son, saying, Behold, I heard thy father speak unto Esau thy brother, saying,

verses.name: Genesis 27:7
verses.text: Bring me venison, and make me savoury meat, that I may eat, and bless thee before the Lord before my death.
